DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically cytologically confirm invasive breast cancer Complete resection primary tumor Stage IIII ( T13 , N03 , M0 ) disease Enrolled clinical trial CANNCICMA27 . No locally recurrent metastatic breast cancer Hormone receptor status : Estrogen receptor progesterone receptorpositive disease PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Postmenopausal status , define one following : At least 60 year old Age 4559 year spontaneous cessation menses > 12 month prior chemotherapy study randomization Age 4559 year cessation menses < 12 month secondary hysterectomy AND folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) level postmenopausal range ( > 34.4 IU/L ) Age 4559 year hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) discontinue HRT diagnosis breast cancer AND FSH level postmenopausal range ( > 34.4 IU/L ) Bilateral oophorectomy PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
